readable.content: A girl is wearing a blue wig under a brown hooded jacket . A man wears an interesting blue wig in public A person with blue hair , a baseball cap , and a hood on stands outdoors in a crowd . Man with brown coat and sunglasses wears a blue wig and ball cap . One person in a crowd of people , wearing a blue wig
